scripts.build: sass scss/common.scss:css/common.css sass scss/folderModal.scss:css/folderModal.css sass scss/internetModal.scss:css/internetModal.css sass scss/loadingScreen.scss:css/loadingScreen.css sass scss/loginScreen.scss:css/loginScreen.css sass scss/mainScreen.scss:css/mainScreen.css sass scss/memoScreen.scss:css/memoScreen.css sass scss/myComputerModal.scss:css/myComputerModal.css sass scss/quizModal.scss:css/quizModal.css sass scss/rspModal.scss:css/rspModal.css
